targets.query:
from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station"] == "${Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "timezone")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "module"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station"] == "${Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "noise")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "module"])
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station"] == "${Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "noise")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station"] == "${Station}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "altitude")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "co2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] =~ /${Module:pipe}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "module"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] =~ /${Module:pipe}/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "module"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pressure")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station"] == "${Station}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "module"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "pressure_trend")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["station"] == "${Station}")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Trend"})
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "module"])
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "max_temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "humidity")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "rf_status")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _value: (float(v: r._value) * -1.0)} ))
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "battery_percent")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "temp_trend")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time"])
  |> rename(columns: {_value: "Trend"})
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "netatmo")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["module"] == "${Module}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "min_temp")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "netatmo",
  tag: "station",
  predicate: (r) => true
)
list.name: Station
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "netatmo",
  tag: "station",
  predicate: (r) => true
)

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "netatmo",
  tag: "module",
  predicate: (r) => r.station == "${Station}"
)
list.name: Module
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

schema.tagValues(
  bucket: "netatmo",
  tag: "module",
  predicate: (r) => r.station == "${Station}"
)
